DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study evaluate pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability single oral dos Alisporivir subject mild moderate hepatic impairment compare match healthy subject normal liver function .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Pharmacokinetics , Safety , Tolerability Alisporivir Subjects With Hepatic Impairment Compared Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female , 18 70 year age , good health Stable ChildTurcottePugh score least 5 Body weight least 50 kg BMI 18.0 36.0 kg/m2 Exclusion criterion : Use investigational drug Women childbearing potential Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
